name: Swagger UI Themes
tagline: A collection of themes to spice up your Swagger docs
body:
### Welcome to Swagger UI Themes.
One of the goals of Swagger UI Themes is to produce high-quality themes that you can use to spice up how your Swagger docs look.

### How to install
1. Download the zip
2. Select one of the stylesheets in the themes folder
3. Add stylesheet to the source of swagger-ui theme html page
4. Make sure to either remove/comment out the link to screen.css or load the desired theme after it to override the default Swagger UI styles. 

### Themes

#### Flattop
![Flattop Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ostranme/swagger-ui-themes/master/screenshots/flattop.png)

#### Muted
![Muted Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ostranme/swagger-ui-themes/master/screenshots/muted.png)

#### Newspaper
![Newspaper Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ostranme/swagger-ui-themes/master/screenshots/newspaper.png)

#### Outline
![Outline Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ostranme/swagger-ui-themes/master/screenshots/outline.png)

#### Monokai
![Monokai Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ostranme/swagger-ui-themes/master/screenshots/monokai.png)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Swagger UI themes? Submit an issue at https://github.com/ostranme/swagger-ui-themes and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
